</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets the [[nameSound]] of a person. By default, when giving orders, the units are addressed by their number. When nameSound is set, it will be used instead to address the unit. For example: "Two, hold fire!", one can have: "Miller, hold fire!".

<template lineStart="1"><title>Informative </title><part><name index="1"/><value> See [[Arma 3 CfgIdentities#NameSounds|CfgIdentities - NameSounds]] for common values.<br>
Note that any word from <tt>[[configfile]] >> "RadioProtocolENG" >> "Words"</tt> is accepted (e.g "veh_infantry_Sniper_s").</value></part></template> </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> person [[setNameSound]] name </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> person: [[Object]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>
